crypto_elements.implementation: NTRU-like scheme with NTT polynomial multiplication
crypto_elements.description: Post-quantum lattice-based encryption resistant to quantum attacks
SIDH broken by classical Castryck-Decru attack (2022)
Efficient polynomial multiplication for lattice-based schemes
Critical for lattice-based security, implementation quality affects security

primary_weakness: SIDH vulnerable to classical cryptanalysis, lattice schemes remain secure
